info.name: MAL back to old "small" icons for cast&crew
info.description: A few days ago MAL changed the size of images for cast, crew, characters and other things. Not everyone likes this change. Want to go back to the smaller images? This script is for you!
info.additionalInfo: I've tested it on the pages it works for, and I didn't notice anything off. Do you spot something that shouldn't be happening? Let me know by sending me a PM on MAL.
